episodes.title: Top 15 Most Disturbing Cult Documentaries
episodes.description:
🔮 15 Most Disturbing Cult Documentaries – Vault of FIFTEEN
 Step inside the chilling world of cults with 15 documentaries that reveal the terrifying power of manipulation, blind devotion, and control. From hidden communes to modern online movements, these films show how belief can be twisted into something deeply disturbing.

🔔 Subscribe to Vault of FIFTEEN for more Top 15 lists on the darkest secrets, true crime, and the most unsettling mysteries of our time.

👉 In this countdown, we cover:
- Love Has Won: The Cult of Mother God
- The Way Down: Gwen Shamblin and the Remnant Fellowship
- The Family
- Escaping Twin Flames
- Heaven’s Gate: The Cult of Cults
- Jesus Camp
- The Deep End (Teal Swan)
- Daughters of the Cult
- Holy Hell
- Jonestown: Terror in the Jungle
- Wild Wild Country
- Children of God: Lost and Found
- Waco: Madman or Messiah
- Seduced: Inside the NXIVM Cult
- Going Clear: Scientology and the Prison of Belief


📌 Disturbing cults exposed
📌 Dark documentaries you shouldn’t miss
📌 True crime and belief gone wrong
📌 Cult leaders and manipulation
📌 Vault of FIFTEEN countdowns

subjects: Church of the First Born of the Lamb of God
